name: webwhispr
description: Privacy-respecting voice input for any text field in your browser. Transcribes speech using Whisper AI running entirely in your browser.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && cp -r icons dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp node_modules/@xenova/transformers/dist/transformers.min.js dist/transformers.min.js
